descriptionHtml:
Another preset made by me! Meet [i][b]Rindi[/b][/i], my main character in Skyrim.

[img]http://i65.tinypic.com/2eg7fwp.png[/img]

I'm actually really sick about all those anime-like or skimpy presets (no offense), so I decided to make a preset which could be human-like and realistic. So, Rindi was designed as Arabian-like, lore-friendly character (as Redguard should be, in my opinion).

[color=#efefef][b][i]Installation: [/i][/b]drop the preset file to Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets

[/color][b][color=#efefef][size=3]Required mods:[/size]

[/color][i][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]RaceMenu[/url]
[/color][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdos
[/url][/color][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]The Eyes of Beauty[/url][/color][/i][/b]

[b][size=3]Recommended mods:[/size][/b]

[color=#efefef][b][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72586/?]Pride of Valhalla[/url] [/i][/b][i](if you are using a different retexture, Rindi will look... well, different. She was designed to be used with Pride of Valhalla though, so I strongly recommend to download it)[/i][/color][b][i][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72586/?]
[/url][/color][color=#efefef][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP body (BASE version)
[/url][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/]Brows[/url] [/i][/b][i](it's mainly an HD retexture of vanilla brows and adds more brows to the game. Is not required)
[/i][i][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67147/?]Painterly[/url] [/b][/i]- an amazing HD warpaint retexture
[b][i]High Resolution Scars[/i][/b] (google it, it isn't on Nexus anymore)

Armor used on screenshots:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69007/?]Witcher 3 Female Armors by zzjay[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80893/?]Ciri DLC Armor by ViciousSARR and Levionte

[/url][b][i][size=3]My other works:
[/size][/i][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85189/?]Varaniel RaceMenu preset[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84873/?]Surelia RaceMenu Preset[/url]
author: Heartless1453
